==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|かい|か|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かいか}} compound {{m|zh|開花|tr=khoj xwæ|lit=to open + flower}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''kāihuā''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|かいか|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かいか|hhira=かいくわ}}

# [[flowering]], [[blossoming]]
#: {{ja-usex|今年は'''開花'''が早い。|^ことし は '''かいか''' が はやい。|This year's bloom was early.}}
# {{qualifier|by extension}} showing [[result]]s, bearing fruit, being [[successful]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|tr=intrans|かいか}}

# to [[flower]], to [[blossom]], to [[bloom]]
# {{qualifier|by extension}} to show results, to [[bear fruit]], to be a success

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|かいか}}

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|bloom}} {{ja-r|咲く|さく}}
